title: Torino - Construction Site Management System
description: Full-stack construction site management application built with Next.js 16, React 19, and TypeScript. Features include inventory tracking, work logging, role-based access control, and real-time updates using Supabase.

title: SexyBrain.Dev (Current Site)
description: Personal portfolio and blog built from scratch without templates. Features include Firebase authentication, blog posting with Markdown support, and Redux state management.
